content:
I see the 2023 January Connectathon proposals are due on July 17 (according to https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/HL7+Calendars). This is less than a week after the 2022 September Connectathon proposals are due (and almost 6 months before the actual event).
Is that accurate?
that can't be right. Let me look at my stuff
sure enough I missed moving a date for the 2023Jan cycle. the proposals are due November 1st for 2023Jan
